text:
:boom-animated:  Hi , I have published one more module in HubSpot marketplace with Name '*Client Testimonial Multi-Layout | UZ*' please have a look and provide me your feedback.

Module: *Client Testimonial Multi-Layout | UZ* :clapping:

<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules/client-testimonial-multi-layout-uz-module-by-unique-coderz>

Features

1. Drag and drop
2. Reusable
3. Mobile Responsive
4. Easy to enhance the features
5. SEO optimized
6. Web Accessibility
7. Speed optimization

:partyparrot:

Hi all, I’ve recently launched <https://www.pocketpros.io|pocketpros.io> and I would love for you to check it out.

It’s a directory of HubSpot experts with the aim of making it easier for companies (and fellow HS experts) to find and connect with HubSpot specialists from across the world.

Please free to sign up and if you have any feedback or suggestions, let me know! :)
